BUILDINGS = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_american_buildings_dlc_trigger = yes
		}
		s:STATE_DISTRICT_OF_COLUMBIA={
			region_state:USA={
				create_building={
					building="building_capitol_hill"
					level=1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_american_buildings_dlc_trigger = yes
		}
		s:STATE_NEW_YORK={
			region_state:USA={
				create_building={
					building="building_central_park"
					level=1
				}
			}
		}
	}
    s:STATE_SVEALAND = {
        region_state:SWE = {
            create_building = {
